=== Gutsy Gibbon Release Party: October 19th, 2007 ===

We had a ton of fun at the Release Party, I finally got to put some faces to all the IRC names that I see at the Thursday IRC meetings. We ate drank and talk about all things Linux. Here are some pictures of the event.

{{http://www.dthomasdigital.com/ununtu/ggrp/ggrp1.jpg}}

Here we are the New Mexico Loco.

{{http://www.dthomasdigital.com/ununtu/ggrp/ggrp2.jpg}}

Yep that's David and Eric I think they've been drinking.

{{http://www.dthomasdigital.com/ununtu/ggrp/ggrp3.jpg}}

Later in the night deep thoughts.

{{http://www.dthomasdigital.com/ununtu/ggrp/ggrp4.jpg}}
Eric and Leslie.

{{http://www.dthomasdigital.com/ununtu/ggrp/ggrp5.jpg}}
Eric shows us how to image using Ubuntu, and how to restore.

{{http://www.dthomasdigital.com/ununtu/ggrp/ggrp6.jpg}}

David T. fish and chips and a pint, can't go wrong with that.

{{http://www.dthomasdigital.com/ununtu/ggrp/ggrp7.jpg}}

Our Founding Member Mike.

What a good time can't wait till the next one.

Check out the info on GutsyReleaseParties We will be adding more information as we get it.

{{http://www.dthomasdigital.com/ununtu/grpl.png}}
